summary: The module defines a suite of fast unit tests for the GLIGEN text-to-image diffusion pipeline, offering utilities to construct dummy components and inputs, and validating key behaviors such as attention slicing, output format consistency, batch versus single inference equivalence, and compatibility with various scheduler configurations.
business_intent: Provide automated regression testing to guarantee the correctness and stability of the GLIGEN text-to-image diffusion pipeline, supporting reliable deployment and ongoing development in research or production environments.
